ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities in the osu-wiki repository have focused on updating the MWC 7K 2025 team listing and rules. Multiple pull requests and push events have been made to adjust the team listings, add full player list links, and update the tournament listing. Additionally, a news post for the 3 Digit World Cup 2025 registrations has been added, including a registration link, banner image, and forum thread links. These updates demonstrate ongoing efforts to maintain and improve the osu-wiki content.

ppy/osu-framework.summary: The osu-framework repository has seen significant activity recently, with multiple pull requests targeting various aspects of the framework. These include adding linux-arm64 build support for FFmpeg, implementing native macOS image loading support to improve texture loading times, and cleaning up Objective-C interop code by moving NSString/NSImage conversion methods and using convenient constructors. These updates aim to enhance the framework's functionality, performance, and code quality.
